mutants.original_line: words = [word.replace("hello", "goodbye") for word in words if len(word) >= 5]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word.replace('', 'goodbye') for word in words if len(word) >= 5]
mutants.code:
def remove_short_words(string: str) -> str:
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    words = [word.replace('', 'goodbye') for word in words if len(word) >= 5]
    words = words[::-1]
    modified_string = ' '.join(words)
    return modified_string
